snippet: The convention has offered an early glimpse of some of the party’s ambitious prospects, including Gov. Martin O’Malley of Maryland and Mayor Antonio Villaraigosa of Los Angeles.
abstract: Political Memo; Democratic National Convention offers a glimpse of the party's most ambitious prospects, some of whom are already positioning themselves to run in the 2016 presidential election.
lead_paragraph: The convention has offered an early glimpse of some of the party’s ambitious prospects, including Gov. Martin O’Malley of Maryland and Mayor Antonio Villaraigosa of Los Angeles.

headline.seo: Democrats Look Ahead to Prospects for 2016
headline.main: Looking Past November for a Preview of 2016
headline.print_headline: Looking Past November for a Preview of 2016
